Clean
```{r}
grouping_data <- read_excel("data/UMD_UCI Condition_7.20.22.xlsx")
grouping_data <- grouping_data %>% 
  mutate(condition = as.factor(Condition),
         child_id = as.character(ChildID)) 


grouping_data <- grouping_data %>% 
  select(c("child_id", "condition"))

grouping_data <- grouping_data %>% 
 mutate(condition =
  case_when(condition == "Both" ~ "1",
            condition == "Mom" ~ "2",
            condition == "Dad" ~ "3",
            condition == "Control" ~ "4"))

saveRDS(grouping_data, file="data/grouping_data.dta")

grouping_data <- readRDS(file = "data/grouping_data.dta")

```
